analysis.key_quote: This proposed rule is not about addressing poor performance; it is about rewarding those with money and power while hurting hard working Americans like myself and my co-workers who work hard to serve other Americans in our capacities as civil servants.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, highlighting concerns about increased politicization, undermining of merit-based systems, and threats to democratic values, which align with the themes of opposition to the rule.
